00022 
00023 #include <fcgio.h>
00024 
00033 class U_EXPORT UFCgi : public UCgiInput {
00034 public:
00035 
00038         UFCgi()
00039                 {
00040                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UFCgi, "", 0)
00041                 }
00042 
00045         virtual ~UFCgi()
00046                 {
00047                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UFCgi)
00048                 }
00049 
00050         // SERVICES
00051 
00052         void init()
00053                 {
00054                 U_TRACE(0, "UFCGI::init()")
00055 
00056                 FCGX_Init();
00057                 FCGX_InitRequest(&request, 0, 0);
00058                 }
00059 
00060         void finish()
00061                 {
00062                 U_TRACE(0, "UFCGI::finish()")
00063 
00064                 FCGX_Finish_r(&request);
00065                 }
00066 
00067         bool accept()
00068                 {
00069                 U_TRACE(0, "UFCGI::accept()")
00070 
00071                 bool result = (FCGX_Accept_r(&request) == 0);
00072 
00073                 U_RETURN(result);
00074                 }
00075 
00078         virtual uint32_t read(char* data, uint32_t length) const
00079                 {
00080                 U_TRACE(0, "UFCgi::read(%p,%u)", data, length)
00081 
00082                 uint32_t result = FCGX_GetStr(data, length, request.in);
00083 
00084                 U_RETURN(result);
00085                 }
00086 
00089         virtual UString getenv(const char* varName) const
00090                 {
00091                 U_TRACE(0, "UFCgi::getenv(%S)", varName)
00092 
00093                 // Parse environment
00094 
00095                 int pos;
00096                 char* name;
00097                 char* value;
00098 
00099                 for (char** e = request.envp; *e != NULL; ++e)
00100                         {
00101                         name  = *e;
00102                         value = strchr(name, '=');
00103                         pos   = (value - name);
00104 
00105                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(value)
00106 
00107                         if (strncmp(varName, name, pos) == 0)
00108                                 {
00109                                 UString result(name + pos + 1);
00110 
00111                                 U_RETURN_STRING(result);
00112                                 }
00113                         }
00114 
00115                 U_RETURN_STRING(UString::getStringNull());
00116                 }
00117 
00118         // DEBUG
00119 
00120 #ifdef DEBUG
00121         const char* dump(bool reset) const
00122                 {
00123                 *UObjectIO::os << "request " << (void*)&request;
00124 
00125                 if (reset)
00126                         {
00127                         UObjectIO::output();
00128 
00129                         return UObjectIO::buffer_output;
00130                         }
00131 
00132                 return 0;
00133                 }
00134 #endif
00135 
00136 protected:
00137         FCGX_Request request;
00138 };
